WRITING.TEXT: Barcelona. It is, by far, my favorite band. My friend only showed me them earlier this year, but I have listened to their music all the time. Just recently, I saw them live at a local venue. I can't describe it as anything other than amazing.
I really want to know if anyone got chosen for such a honor.
That is exactly how I came to enjoy sleep paralysis. I have yet to fully project though sadly ;-;
